title: Are the questions of the 12th boards the same as the NCERT books exercise has? - Quora
tags: National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT)

response.answer_text: Not exactly same. I give you example. In biology they asks from topics given in chapter. In chemistry numerical and reactions are asked from exercise but for long and short question theory given in the book is important.

Yes some of them. The basic idea is that the concepts asked are from the ncert itself. You may not get an exact same question picked up directly from the exercise. For a better understanding of the type of questions asked refer the previous year question papers.
